set(this_module_name "common")
set(this_unit_memberships "core")
set(this_extra_include_directories)
set(this_build_library "vole_common")
set(this_build_executable)
set(this_module_variable "VOLE_COMMON")
set(this_module_description "Common classes used in the vole framework")
set(this_module_general_requirements)

#VoleRequiredModules()

VoleCompileLibrary(
	"hashes.cpp"
	"config"
	"filesystem_helpers"
	"data_traits.h"
	"global_defines.h"
	"array1d.h" "array2d.h"
	"hashes.h" "image_group.h" "image_list.h"
	"index.h" "pixel.h"
	"string_conversion"
	"vole_storage"
	"vole_error.h" "vole_exception.h" "vole_image.h"
	"vole_limits"
	"vole_user_paths"
	"qtopencv"
	"multi_img"
	"multi_img_io"
	"labeling"
	"stopwatch"
	"progress_observer"
)
